product_name: Ben's 30 Insect Repellent Combo Pack - 30 Percent DEET - 1.25 fl. oz.
long_description: You'll enjoy the outdoors more this summer if you're not swatting flies and mosquitoes; Ben's 30% DEET Wilderness Formula saves the day! DEET (N, N-dimethyl-m-toluamide) is the most effective insect repellent available. Active ingredient 30% DEET offers a high level of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, chiggers, fleas and no-see-ums. Effectively repels insects that may carry West Nile Virus and Lyme Disease. Water-based formula contains no alcohol. 2-bottle Home & Field combo pack lets you leave the larger bottle at home and take the small refillable bottle with you in the field.
short_description: You'll enjoy the outdoors more this summer if you're not swatting flies and mosquitoes; Ben's 30% DEET Wilderness Formula saves the day!
